title: 2.2 Master Challenge 1
question: Create a new template of width 500 px and height 700px. Add the text WELCOME to it. As a new layer, add an image of a house. Adjust the opacity of the image layer in such a way that the underlying text is visible. Save the image file.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
